General.Name: Solteam Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Solteam Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in the design, development, manufacture, and sale of electronic components worldwide. The company offers switches, inlets/outlets, adapters, battery holders, controller modules, EV parts, surrounding/other products, aquarium peripherals, optical products, and medical devices. Its products are used in power tools, home appliances, auto, medical, and IT industries. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 888, Jing GWO Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 33051
